text.sentence: To all: We will fly into Dubuque Friday April 20th and stay overnight.
We are going to a wedding on the 21st in Minneapolis and will return to Dubuque on Sunday the 22nd.
We will then be in Dubuque until Wednesday the 25th (we fly out late on the 25th).
Hope to see you all, but we'll settle for some.
We already have our first wild fire of the season.
It was yet another controlled burn that got out of control near Ruidoso - quite a distance from here.
45 mile per hour winds are expected for tomorrow.
Diane and I have appointments set up with two insurance agents in order to evaluate our insurance coverage.
